text: Ana nehigeno agrama mani'nefintira teve tirupinti tinkna huno varehirami varehirami huno tevemo'a e'ne. Ana nehige'za tausen tausenia agatereno rama'a vahetamimo'za agri tvaontera mani'neza agri eri'zana erinentazageno, ohampriga'a vahe krerfamo'za Agri avuga oti'naze. Anante keagafina ufreno agafa huno keaga refko hu'za higeno, avontafe tamimo'a ru vakarente vagarege'na ke'noe.
